lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when you meet someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting.

items.explanation_en: This question asks about someone's recent state.
This is a common question to inquire about the current time.
This question expresses concern for someone's well-being.

items.en: do you have any plans for today?
items.explanation_en: This asks if someone has activities scheduled for the day.
This question inquires about someone's activities from the previous day.

items.en: will you join us for lunch?
items.target: ¿te unirás a nosotros para el almuerzo?
items.explanation_en: This is an invitation to share a meal together.

items.en: how do you like this place?
items.explanation_en: This question asks for someone's opinion about a location.

items.en: it's been a while since we met.
items.target: ha pasado un tiempo desde que nos vimos.
items.explanation_en: This statement reflects on the time since the last meeting.
This question checks if someone is prepared to leave.
This expresses a desire to reconnect in the near future.
